Resource authoring details

short.value: The prescriber, the person who made the prescription, and who takes the responsibility of the treatment. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

short.value: Time of issuing (signing) the prescription by health care professional. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

short.value: Status of the prescription, this should not be status of treatment. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Status of the resource

short.value: Reason for the current status of prescription, for example the reason why the prescription was made invalid or why the prescription was changed from previous

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.
